arca.ste.hash_functions package

Submodules

arca.ste.hash_functions.hash_function_scheme module

class HashFunctionScheme

Bases: abc.ABC

An interface representing a hash function scheme. The interface is intended to capture different usages of the same hash function family.

abstract hash(plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Computes a hash over the given plaintext.

Parameters

plaintext¶ – the plaintext to hash

Returns

a hash

abstract hmac(key: bytes, plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Computes an HMAC (keyed hash) over the given plaintext with the given key.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to use

  • plaintext¶ – the plaintext to compute an HMAC over

Returns

an HMAC

arca.ste.hash_functions.simple_hash_function_scheme module

class SimpleHashFunctionScheme

Bases: arca.ste.hash_functions.hash_function_scheme.HashFunctionScheme

A simple hash function scheme using primitives from the simple crypto module. Implements the HashFunctionScheme interface.

hash(plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Computes a hash over the given plaintext.

Parameters

plaintext¶ – the plaintext to hash

Returns

a hash

hmac(key: bytes, plaintext: bytes) → bytes

Computes an HMAC (keyed hash) over the given plaintext with the given key.

Parameters

  • key¶ – the key to use

  • plaintext¶ – the plaintext to compute an HMAC over

Returns

an HMAC
